entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
